creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: delicately painted landscape; small cluster of trees at bottom with boulders and a small open-walled structure; boulders and low mountains in background; small inscription at ULC
marks: ULC: [Tenpo Tsuchinoe Inu haru hajime Banzan sodo  ULC: [Chikuto Sanjin]
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: Landscape in the Manner of Ni Zan
